nav.div: Torrington Public Schools » For Staff » Covid-19 Resources

span.strong: Click below for information from Cigna regarding COVID-19 (coronavirus)

strong.span: The Family First Coronavirus Response Act takes effect on April 1, 2020.

br.span:
Please contact Director of Human Resources, Kim Schulte, for your rights and benefits under the FFCRA.
Click here for the US Department of Labor Coronavirus Resource page.
Click here for the CT Department of Labor “Frequently Asked Questions” about the Coronavirus.
Stay healthy and safe, and we will get through this together.
